name: 3,4-Dihydroxybenzoate:NADPH oxidoreductase (brominating, decarboxylating)
definition: 3,4-Dihydroxybenzoate + 2 NADPH + 2 Bromide + 2 Oxygen + 4 H+ <=> 3,5-Dibromobenzene-1,2-diol + 2 NADP+ + CO2 + 4 H2O
